page.title: 15MEDIA IN THE HOME,LIVERPOOL
page.content:
A SAMPLE OF 100 BOYS WERE INTERVIEWED FROM ST.TERESA'S SCHOOL IN ORDER TO FIND THE MEANS THEY HAD AVAILABLE FOR ACQUIRING INFORMATION IN THEIR HOMES.BELOW ARE THE FACTS THAT WERE GATHERED.
{ *************************** { * * { * TELEVISION SETS....100% * { * RADIOS............. 95% * { * TELEPHONES......... 65% * { * NEWSPAPERS......... 60% * { * MAGAZINES.......... 60% * { * VIDEO MACHINES..... 50% * { * COMPUTERS.......... 44% * { * CEEFAX/ORACLE T.V.. 32% * {* * {*************************** }
